page.title: 01BRYN-AN INTRODUCTION
page.content: BRYN-A SMALL VILLAGE SITUATED IN THE VALLEY OF THE FFRWDWYLLT RIVER APPROX 5 MILES FROM PORTTALBOT ON THE {B4282} IN WEST GLAMORGAN.AT PRESENT THERE ARE {649}NAMES ON THE ELECTORAL ROLLAND {75 CHILDREN ON THE SCHOOL ROLL,AS WELL AS {50}CHILDREN TRAVELLING TO DYFFRYN COMP. MOST OF THOSE WORKING HAVE TO TRAVEL OUTSIDE THE AREA.PORT TALBOT AND BRID- GEND BEING THE MAIN AREAS.ONLY 2 FROM THE VILLAGE ARE EMPLOYED IN THE LOCAL GARAGE AND 5 IN THE LOCAL MINE.ABOUT 20 OTHERS ARE EMPLOYED ON THE FARMS,SHOPS,POST OFFICE AND BUILDING SITE.THE AREA IS PLANTED WITH CONIFERS WITH THE LOWER VALLEY USED FOR SHEEP. MYNYDD PENHYDD (N),MYNYDD BACH(S) ARE APPROX. 300m IN HEIGHT.THE B4282 IS THE ONLY ROUTE THROUGH THE AREA LINKING PORT TALBOT AND MAESTEG.
